about_the_game:
■[Win or lose, it'll be steamy!] An 18+ otome (adult romance) RPG where you play a game with the devil!



You(the main character), an adventurer who has unfortunately fallen into a pitfall, are about to be approached by the devil...!
By winning a simple game of reaching the exit without hitting a dead end,
you can make the devil acknowledge you as a special person and save your life.

But the devil won't let you go for free.
Will you accept his invitation, make a promise, and become the devil's possession forever?
Or will you turn the tables and become his master instead?
Perhaps you'll thank him with something other than your soul and negotiate a peaceful departure?
Or maybe you'll outsmart him by offering your body to create a debt he owes you?

The ending is determined by your choices. And so are the intimate scenes...

+-------------------------+

■Characters


★The Devil

・The type of guy who calls you "darling" or "sweet thing"
・His special skill is transformation
・Acts cunning and clever, but is actually very easy to manipulate

★The main character (nameless)

・An adventurer who unfortunately fell into a pitfall
・Has caught the devil's eye
・(Depending on your choices) Can be either cheeky or a pushover, or anywhere in between

+-------------------------+

■Game Features



In this game, The main character(=MC) doesn't have any dialogue lines - everything is presented as choices for you to make.
There's no affection rating system for the characters you interact with. No matter how you respond, they won't dislike you. Feel free to choose your favorite lines and reactions to either please or tease the devil.


The game offers 7 different endings and 4 unique intimate scenes.

★ Ending 1: "Never Play Game with the Devil"
What if you lose the "game" with the devil...?

★ Ending 2: "Never Defy the Devil"
What happens if you try to overpower the devil by force...?

★ Ending 3: "Never Make Promises with the Devil"
What will the devil do to you if you become his property...?
(Content: Interspecies penetration, massive creampie)

★ Ending 4: "Never Repay the Devil"
What kind of "gratitude" does the devil desire...?
(Content: Cunnilingus, tentacle insertion)

★ Ending 5: "Never Put the Devil in Your Debt"
Is this the only way to outsmart the devil...?
(Content: Prostitution play)

★ Ending 6: "Once a Devil, Always a Devil"
How to discipline a cheeky devil... Method 1
(Content: Reverse anal with a magically grown appendage on the devil)

★ Ending 7: "If You Catch a Devil, Be Prepared to Be Caught"
How to discipline a cheeky devil... Method 2
(Content: Multiple orgasms using female genitalia)

+-------------------------+

■Bonus Features: Memory Room & Post-Ending Devil's Commentary!



The Memory Room unlocks after reaching any one of the seven endings.
You can easily access and view all endings, including those you haven't yet experienced in-game!
